attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our “wonderful and amazing” president because you know 🧚✨yeebo trump 2020✨🧚 the way he discriminated against minorities is sooooo inspiring. i opened the app and everything went orange.  then i heard a knock at my door. it was the SECRET SERVICE. how do i know that? i don’t know i thought it was supposed to be a secret. anyway, they came to get me. they put me in the back of a van forcefully because they said i wasn’t complying even though i did nothing to them. i then got to the white house and saw more men. it smelled like onions EVERYWHERE. they pushed me inside and i saw the cheeto puff with his son barron. he looked so sad 😞 the tiktokers were right he needs to be saved. the orange man then pointed at me and said “ATTACK THE HISPANIC” and then tons of angry chickens with spray tans attacked me. i was choking on tanned chicken feathers. but then barron couldn’t take it anymore so while his dad was laughing maniacally at me he helped me fend off the chickens and escape. he told me to run. that is why i am here writing this review right now. if i never escaped i probably would be in a cage at the border. thank you barron. we must save him he will probably get in trouble for helping me. i would expect for the government to pay for my hospital bills from being brutally beaten by those ugly orange chickens but i don’t think they like me very much. moral of the story. no more trump 2020. no more yeebo. i will never see a chicken the same again.
attributes.title: THIS IS CRAZY
